Class Reactor

java.lang.Object
  Reactor

public class Reactor
extends java.lang.Object

This class controls a reactors temperature ensuring it does not go over some maximum

Method Detail

getTemperature

public int getTemperature()
Reads the current temperature

Returns:
Returns the value of the reactor's current temperature

increaseTemp

public boolean increaseTemp()
Increase temperature if safe to do so drop to zero and raise alarm if not

Returns:
Returns true if an attempt is made to raise temperature above MAX and false otherwise

decreaseTemp

public boolean decreaseTemp()
Decrease temperature if temperature stays above zero set to zero and raise alarm if not

Returns:
Returns true if an attempt is made to adjust temperature above zero and false otherwise
